title: Why electric scooters are illegal in New York and London
description: Spend any time in New York or London and youll come across dozens of people whizzing along each citys streets on electric scooters. Yet, despite their popularity, e-scooters are technically illegal in both places, and the politicians with the power to change things are in no rush to do so. So what's the hold up?
